thread.section_title: Mercure London Paddington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great for both business trip and family trip
thread.title_full: Great for both business trip and family trip - Review of Mercure London Paddington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Amir B
title: Great for both business trip and family trip
text:
took my family to business trip with me, the hotel location at walking distance from office centers and major city attractions. i upgraded the room to 'Executive' suite and find it good for 2 adults and infant sleeping at supplied baby cot only for 20# per night.
managed to get by with stroller. the stuff was attention to any request and help a lot.
